value:
dashboard.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: dashboard.<%= @host.domain %>
foreman.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: foreman.<%= @host.domain %>
foundation.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: foundation.<%= @host.domain %>
haproxy.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: haproxy.<%= @host.domain %>
jasig.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: jasig.<%= @host.domain %>
jenkins.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: jenkins.<%= @host.domain %>
mattermost.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: mattermost.<%= @host.domain %>
munin.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: 127.0.0.1
nexus.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: nexus.<%= @host.domain %>
redmine.<%= @host.domain %>:
  address: redmine.<%= @host.domain %>

"/root/.ssh/id_rsa":
  ensure: file
  mode: '0600'
  content: <%= @host.params['id_dsa'] %>
"/root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub":
  ensure: file
  mode: '0644'
  content: <%= @host.params['id_dsa.pub'].split(@host.shortname + ": ")[1].split("\n")[0] %>
"/root/.ssh/known_hosts":
  ensure: file
  mode: '0644'
"/etc/apache2/conf-available/munin.conf":
  ensure: file
  source: "/etc/munin/apache24.conf"
  replace: false
  require:
  - Package[apache2]
  - Package[munin]
  notify: Service[apache2]
"/etc/apache2/conf-enabled/munin.conf":
  ensure: link
  target: "/etc/apache2/conf-available/munin.conf"
